content: The jet stream position determines winter severity in the Pacific Northwest. A n
Originally logged full entry content in spill on every retrieval. This bloated t
When crib logs a retrieval, it records which channels returned results but not t
Log messages are sentences, not codes. stored entry #42 (decision), 3 triples ex
Log rotation is manual: when the database exceeds a size threshold, archive the
Spill SQLite writes blocked under high concurrency when multiple tools logged si
Spill falls back to stderr when not available. Every tool checks for SPILL_HOME
Log entries include the tool name as a structured field, not embedded in the mes
Spill provides three severity levels: info, warn, error. There is no debug level
spill logs to a single SQLite database shared across all tools. Each log entry r
Antecedent basis rule: never reference internal module names or jargon in descri
Experiment scripts live in experiment/ within the blog repo, not in the tool rep
Rebasing is preferred over merge commits for keeping history linear. Interactive
Git tags are not used for versioning. Tools are pinned by commit hash when refer
Commit messages use a tool-name prefix followed by a colon: crib: add consolidat
Each tool repo uses a single main branch with no feature branches. Commits go di
Error handling follows fail-open semantics: if a non-critical operation like emb
JSON.generate produces a JSON string from a Ruby object. JSON.pretty_generate ad
Ruby frozen_string_literal pragma prevents accidental string mutation. All tool
All tools use Ruby stdlib only â€” no gems. This eliminates Bundler, gemspec files
